parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the component in this explode step

title: IExplodeStep.IGetComponent
description: Gets the specified component in this explode step.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the component in this explode step

returns: Specified component in the explode step
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IExplodeStep::GetNumOfComponents
to get a valid value for Index.
